info_3: Internal connections were bad before I got around to hanging it.  Support was quick to wave the "Out of Warranty" flag.  I disassembled it and rubbed the connections clean. That fixed it.I'm not impressed with the display.  It's not clear whether the temperature showing is the current temp or the hoped for temp.

title: Perfectly simple thermostat
author: Watermelon Pie
info_3: Nice and simple thermostat that seems to do its job well. Being techy, I would have loved to have tried theÂ Honeywell RTH9580WF Wi-Fi Smart Touchscreen Thermostat, Silver, but I'm glad we didn't. For as little attention as we give to the thermostat, this one is just perfect.

title: Simple, Affordable Programmable Thermostat
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: As advertised. Easy to install and use.

title: ... keep the heat on till bout 77 78 degrees waste of
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: I only use for gas heat and I set them at 57 degrees and it keep the heat on till bout 77 78 degrees waste of money

title: Great thermostat..easy to program, easy to use
author: MikeinPA
info_3: I bought this unit as a replacement for a mechanical milliamp thermostat that came with my through-the-wall auxiliary heater.  The installation (and instructions) were among the easiest I have ever found.  The unit is very easy to program (no need to even read this part of the instructions)....the installation instructions were very clear and it mounted with little trouble.  I would definitively buy another of these unit and am considering replacing my main thermostat with this model as it is far easy to use (both setup and temporary overrides)

title: Huge savings last heating season
author: Anon
info_3: After an extremely expensive first winter in a new home, I replaced my ancient manual dial thermostat (complete with mercury vial) with this unit. It was incredibly easy to install -- there are only two wires to connect. It takes some time to run through a full week of programming, but once it's set, you're good to go. Using this saved me 70% on my bill when the next heating season came around. I like how easy it is to manually override programming and temporarily reset the temperature.

title: Heat only thermostats are not programmable and 2x the price
author: unlimited1
info_3: this was the lowest cost thermostat at the time that is programmable, to replace an older model that no longer worked correctly.while there is no central air (older home),  a high efficiency condensing boiler (baseboard heat) is used and a mini split for A/C(separate Thermostat). This tstat met the specs that is compatible to work with the high efficiency boiler. It is a fast and easy setup that made it a good replacement and an easy choice.It has a switch for Heat-Off-A/C.  Set it( program) and forget it!

title: Five Stars
author: S and C
info_3: Perfect simple thermostat.

title: Three Stars
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Easy to installed, delivery in time , works fine but little  dirty inside the screen

title: Love it! Easy to install.
author: Miclipse
info_3: Had the old style thermostat and the door broke. Tried to fix it but it kept dropping off. Looked for a replacement door but it was not available. So I did the American thing and replaced the unit. Love it! Easy to install. Love having the light so it is easy to adjust at night in the dark. But like that it is not on all the time. Fairly easy to program but the instructions are needed.

title: Al Borland says "Better than Binford!"
author: Brad Mpls
info_3: Works perfectly.  Programs run just like I want.  I especially like the feature where you can bypass the program setting, set a temporary temperature and "hold" it until pressing "run" again (to go back to the program).  Installation went okay.  Color code matching and explanations were slightly confusing.  My old wiring had unusual color schemes on the wires, but I figured it out (call me Al, not Tim).

title: Recommended
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: easy to operate!!

title: both of which work fine. Don't know if there was rough handling during ...
author: C Llewellyn FR Alpacas
info_3: Ordered 2 of these. One didn't work at all, the other had a broken switch. Bought 2 of the exact same product at Home Depot for less $, both of which work fine. Don't know if there was rough handling during shipment, or what the problem was....disappointing and time consuming.

title: Easy to install and programming is easy enough if you read the directions
author: Justjager
info_3: Installation was easy and programming is simple enough. Works much better than the ancient "mercury bulb" model it replaced. Would order again if needed. Only had it a few days so I can't comment on battery life. The display is bright enough to be seen well in any light.For basic heat and air only which would fit the needs of most. Won't work on heat pumps or specialty products.

title: Forget about customer service
author: Mitchell
info_3: Make sure you don't mix the AAA batteries, with one new and one old, or the old one can corrode and ruin the thermostat.  Customer service is horrible and they can't speak English and they don't want to help you.The thermostat is difficult to dissemble and replace batteries.  I would buy a model that has the battery compartment on the outside, not internal.  On the other hand it keeps room temperature within a tight range, which is better than my previous thermostat.

title: It works fine
author: GoldenWandDove
info_3: It was easy to install. It works. The temporary over-ride is pretty terrible in the way that it functions, it over-rides for a couple of seconds so it has to be reprogrammed instead, but hey, it was cheap and it does work

title: Great choice
author: Stairkipper
info_3: Easy to program.  I "down graded" from a more expensive thermostat and I am thankful that I did.  This took minutes to install and it was easy to operate.  The easier the better!

title: This item is very easy to use
author: NikaC
info_3: This item is very easy to use. It has helped know exactly what the temperature in my apartment is. It has also helped keep out electric bill at the same cost per month. I would recommend this product every chance I get.

title: Our HVAC repairman replaced the thermostat with a different Honeywell model that is working just fine.
author: Katie Blake
info_3: This product was defective and caused a short in my furnace, even after we installed it per instructions and called Honeywell's support line three times. $400 later, our furnace works again. Our HVAC repairman replaced the thermostat with a different Honeywell model that is working just fine.

title: Display died after less than 2 months
author: Hilary J. Binda
info_3: Thermostat was fine and yesterday the display was gone. About 6 weeks after it was installed. Other thermostats lasted for years. Garbage and can't return it.

title: Good, basic digital thermostat
author: Marianne L
info_3: Good, basic digital thermostat. Bought this as a replacement for the old mercury kind. It was easy to install just by reading the directions. We were first timers and had no issues. It has really helped us be more conscientious of our heating and cooling. It also looks much nicer than the old dial.

title: Great, no issues at all!
author: Michelle Hopkins
info_3: The thermostat is just as described. It replaced a low-end programmable Honeywell we replaced 5 years ago when we moved into our house that broke when it got shocked from static electricity and my finger (ouch!). This was half the cost of the one we bought from Lowe's 5 years ago, but has more features so we were worried it wouldn't be what we expected. We have been pleased with it feeling that it is definitely an upgrade to the model we had before and it was much less expensive.

title: Works great. Easy install
author: 2curious
info_3: Works great.  Easy install.  Love the setting for different times of day.  I make it so the heat is low at bed time then gets warmer an hour before I wake up.  Solves the prob of being hot at night only to wake up freezing.

title: Simple install and perfect reliability!
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: I bought this to replace the original thermostat (different brand) on my wall furnace that continually malfunctioned. The fact that it has wiring for ac and heat didn't matter, i just hooked up the heat..simple installation. The Honeywell thermostat has worked flawlessly.

title: Works for RV Tstat Replacement
author: ZCycles
info_3: I adapted this to run my RV AC/Heater system.  Easy to do, works just fine at a quarter the cost of the replacement one for the RV.  This one even programmable and has a back light for those really dark nights.

title: Hope to save some money this winter
author: Brian
info_3: Bought 2 of these and installed. They work well. The 4 rating is solely for one flaw...the unit is extremely difficult to remove from the wall plate in order to change the batteries.

title: Cut my heating bill
author: Kaitlyn McCarthy
info_3: Went from a $600 February to a $350 March. Granted, it was warmer but this little guy had our back. Was looking at a nest, but then thought better. Why should my thermostat take the time to learn when I can program it once? This is a fraction of the cost. This is dead simple to wire if you are converting from one of those analog, Mercury based round thermometers.

title: This was bought to correct problems with thermostat.
author: Doc Beech
info_3: I have tested this vs an indoor temp recording unit. The old thermostat was +/- 10 degrees. currently set on 65 at night, it holds 64-65.5 and set at 68 its holding 67.1 to 67.7 during the day time. This is very accurate and its doing a great job of keeping temperatures more stable. The settings are wonderful too. When we leave we have it set to save money (already seeing a savings of about 30 dollars a month). And no going back to change it! Set it and forget it!

title: Easy to install
author: s.low
info_3: Easy to install. This is my first winter with it and it is great to have it kick on in the early moring to warm us while we get ready for work. Its also great to know its not running all day untill an hour before we get home. I havent gotten a bill with it in use yet. But I know it will help with heating costs.

title: Easy to install and program, works as expected
author: nuker
info_3: Easy to install and program, works as expected. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the size of the unit is so small it doesn't fully cover the original wall plate that held the old thermostat.  It looks OK but it would be nice if they also provided an adapter plate for situations like this.

title: It works well and it's easy to use!
author: Bianca
info_3: Easy and simple interface! I am home all day so I had no need for a programmable thermostat.

title: Works great
author: Joel
info_3: This thermostat works great.  I don't program it though because I am here most of the time and when I'm not here I don't want it cooling the house for the fun of it, that costs money and I don't have much for things like that.

title: Thermostat needed new batteries every six months for the first ...
author: R. Dugas
info_3: Thermostat needed new batteries every six months for the first year. Now at one and one-half years, it needs them every two weeks.

title: Good thermostat but maybe I should stick to the old dials
author: Bill Burns
info_3: I like the idea of a set-back thermostat, but they can be a pain to set.  This one is not too bad, but cycling through two sets of days (weekdays and weekend) and then four (I think it is) time ranges within each of those days is a bit annoying.  Easier than the one before it, but not really simple.  One thing I notice is that it seems to run the heat to one degree above the setting?  I guess so that it doesn't start as often?  Haven't run it with A/C much yet.  Good product for the price.

title: Happy customer.
author: Amazonian
info_3: Bought this to replace an old unit from the 70's.  Works great.  Easy to install and use.  Love being able to set a schedule.  I wouldn't mind a backlight specific button for when you want it on at all times.

title: Good budget programmable thermostat.
author: Virginia C Hamner
info_3: For the money, this is a great programmable thermostat. Installation was easy and we did not have to install a new bracket even though our old thermostat was a different brand. The 5-2 program is enough for our current needs as we decide whether we want to upgrade to a "smart" thermostat. As we live in temperate Florida, I do have to change the program from time to time, as cold fronts move through, but it is easy to change and has been accurate with the temp so far.

title: Easy to install & use.
author: Text4Success
info_3: I purchased one of these locally and the price was much higher.  However, I was so impressed I purchased this one as a gift for a friend. She installed it herself without any difficulty.

title: Does the job
author: M T
info_3: I like it. It's not fancy and does what it needs to. Interface is a bit clunky - you have to scroll through all the options to get to what you need to update. No "C" terminal on this one. (It's not the same as "Rc"; learned that the hard way.)

title: Good cheaper thermostate, with temp scheduling.
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Great, cheap thermostate that allows you to set a temp schedule. Saved me $$ on my energy bill by being able to set a 5-2 day schedule. Highly recommend.

title: but a great thermostat all the same for the the unit downstairs
author: Bluejay Robinson
info_3: Not compatible with my heat pump upstairs, but a great thermostat all the same for the the unit downstairs.  Note the 30 day return policy!  I waited a week too long to install this thing before I realized it's not compatible and now can't return it, so I'm out $25 :(

title: lower heat bills
author: Regina
info_3: Easy to install and works perfectly. Now I won't accidentally keep the house so warm while I'm at work.

title: Four Stars
author: Paul & Flavia
info_3: Would be a 5 star if it didn't need the batteries to operate

title: It's relatively easy to install
author: Matt
info_3: This is a basic programmable thermostat.  It's relatively easy to install, and works like a champ.  There are only a few buttons so be sure to hang onto that instruction booklet for future help!

title: Fine Product
author: dairymaiden
info_3: Looks like a good product. Didn't work on our pellet Stove, but that was no fault of the thermostat, but rather our stove's inability to communicate with an outside control. So no complaints.

title: Five Stars
author: B. BARROW
info_3: Product as described. No issues with delivery.

title: Easy
author: Ronald F.
info_3: Cheap, easy to install (I had to look up some instructions online to confirm wiring for my specific situation but they were easy to find on Honeywell's website), and super easy to programNoticed a ~10% reduction in energy use while simultaneously keeping the house just as comfortable, paid for itself in less than 2 months

title: This was easy to install and worked great
author: N. Lawson
info_3: This was easy to install and worked great.  This is perfect for folks who just want a reliable thermostat without useless features that deprecate in a couple years (like phone connectivity).

title: works great, and cheap
author: MT
info_3: i bought 2 of these to replace some very old (30 years) mechanical thermostats.installation was very simple if you're a Do-It-Yourselfer. if you aren't, then call someone.instructions were clear. in total it took around 30 minutes each to install, including removal of old thermostat, cleaning up the wires, mounting, and programming.programming is very simple and straightforward. didn't even have to read the manual.

title: BROKEN
author: Ron
info_3: Thermostat received damaged, as if it wasnt assembled. Other reviewers had same problem.

title: Happy
author: Mr. Mark A. Glass
info_3: Easy to install. I have been using it for over a month and it works as expected. Great device for the price.

title: So Far, So Good
author: Bob D in Boulder
info_3: This thermostat is exactly as advertised and a very good deal for the price. Easy to install and program. It helps to read all the questions and answers as I learned how to change the heat cycling through these comments. Several reviewers commented that it stopped working after a period of time, thus only 4 stars. Hopefully my will work well for more than 2 years/

title: saving
author: L. Castro
info_3: should have bought it sooner, I set up the time and forget about it. no need to remind my kids to turn it off anymore. saving about 30 dollars a month in the winter. I'll update during summer timesUpdate:  So by using the pre-cooling method during the summer time I saved about 30 to 40 dollars a month. Now I'm looking into stucco the house.

title: Love it!
author: V. Boyd
info_3: Was really easy to install and program.

title: Excellent Thermostat
author: Paula
info_3: I have a similar Honeywell programmable thermostat in my living room that has been great for many years.  I purchased this for my  in-law space downstairs and am very pleased with it.

title: Five Stars
author: Kena405
info_3: Works great and super easy to install!

title: Inexpensive unit, poor quality control
author: Andrew S.
info_3: For the price, this is a nice unit.  Functionally it works great and is easy to program.  My complaint is the manufacturing quality.  This seems to be a widespread issue, since I've attempted to exchange the faulty unit a couple times but the problem persists on all of them.  I've also noticed other consumers with the same defect.  When the LCD backlight is on, in the lower right corner of the display you can see black smudges (almost like someone smudged their fingerprint on the inside of the display).  This smudge pattern is almost identical on all the units I've tried.For the price I'm willing to look past this defect, but I'm knocking off 2 stars for the problem.

title: Pretty good.  Don't buy used.
author: Jeff Holmes
info_3: I guess I bought a used unit?  Mine didn't come with the jumper for the Rc and R slots.  So it didn't work until I figured out that was missing.  2 cycle programming is nice, but I think next time I will get a 7 day.

title: Five Stars
author: Angel444
info_3: Easy to install and works fine.

title: A very worthwhile twenty dollar upgrade over analog
author: Ricomalo
info_3: This digital thermostat is much more accurate than the old analog dial-type I replaced. The main reason I replaced the old one was because of its lack of accuracy but this device reads within one degree of my accurate testing thermometer in addition to being programmable. I only had a heater on the old thermostat to the installation was very simple and straighforward. I'm guessing it will pay for itself in less than a year!

title: Worked great and integrated with Echo without a
author: Tom McFadien
info_3: Worked  great and integrated with Echo without a hitch

title: Work well, easy to install!
author: Frank Mennone
info_3: Thermostats work very well, installation and programming is easy. Best way to install is to take a picture of where your wires are currently located on the thermostat you are replacing. I installed 3 of these thermostats in less than 45 mins. Easy DIY job.

title: Utility Saver
author: Sadie
info_3: Easy installation and programming steps. Really help cut back on my AC and heating bill.

title: Five Stars
author: Dr Rock
info_3: Easy to install and the quality you would expect from Honeywell.

title: Good thermostat for the $
author: golden girl
info_3: Easy to follow instructions. Changed out the thermostat in about 15 minutes. Programs Monday through Friday the same each day, and  Saturday/Sunday the same with availability of 4 daily temperature adjustments.

title: A Great Product for the Price
author: Johnny C
info_3: I bought two of these for my home. They were easy to install and set up. If you are looking for a no-nonsense, easy-to-use programmable thermostat, this is a good choice.

title: Great Basic Thermostat
author: Gabriel Lopez
info_3: I purchased this thermostat because my old one stopped working. This is the first thermostat I ever installed and it?™s fairly easy. I took me 15 minutes to install it. The package came with little labels to label your electrical wire which is pretty neat; it comes helpful in the future. The package comes with everything you need to install it. The Thermostat works great, easy to work and program settings.

title: Installed easy and works well
author: K. Pinon
info_3: Swapped out our old analog thermostat with this one.  My husband didn't have any problems installing it and it works like a charm!  IT's also saving us lots of money on our AC bill by using the programmable temperatures.

title: Glad we Upgraded
author: Keith Le Hastings
info_3: Arrived quickly and relatively easy to install and operate.

title: there might be something wrong with the batch. The ...
author: DRN-TK
info_3: there might be something wrong with the batch.  The display had a defect in the corner.  I exchanged it for a new one and this one had the same defect.  Since it is just 25 bucks I left it as is. Its working but not pleasant to look at.  But how often do you look at your Thermostat...

title: Seems like this is one of the outdated products and probably ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Seems like this is one of the outdated products and probably sat in the warehouse for a while (very dusty box received). Worked as expected. Good instructions with it.

title: Easy to Install
author: Elizabeth
info_3: My old (mercury-based) thermostat was registering incorrectly so I bought this one.  Very easy to install and program.  I believe I've saved a couple of bucks in my electricity bill as I now have an accurate temperature gauge.  For the price, this is a good quality product.  Both weekend and weekday settings.  I would expect this function will be very useful when leaving my home for extended periods of time.

title: I wish Friday was a separate setting from the M-F ...
author: SLR
info_3: I wish Friday was a separate setting from the M-F setting as I use this for a second home where I arrive on a Friday.

title: Four Stars
author: lynette NY
info_3: easy install

title: Five Stars
author: Charles D.
info_3: It works!

title: If you're looking for a cheap thermostat that works, easy to install, this is for you!
author: Andrew
info_3: This is a good programmable thermostat. I installed by myself and I'm not particularly a "handyman" or understand housing electrical systems...let alone airconditioning units. But I followed instructions and watched a random youtube video and got it all done within 30 minutes.

title: Ours was faulty
author: R. Haase
info_3: I really liked this thermostat at first, but it burnt up just a few months after installing it. We started burning up fuses in our furnace and couldn't figure out why, called our HVAC guy and he traced it back to a faulty thermostat. Just luck of the draw.

title: Works perfectly.
author: Ron Borsay
info_3: This thermostat works perfectly and exactly as described. No more short heat cycles. Heat remains off unless it's the programmed "return" time or heat drops below the programmed low temperature. Easy to program and overrides with a push of a button.

title: Does a good job of replacing the old one, and is easy to use.
author: Charlie
info_3: The installation went really quick. A half hour, instead of the ~15 minutes the directions said, but that was likely due to removing the old one.Anyways it's pretty easy to program, and it's easy to understand. The downside is that we learned how much of a discrepancy there is between the livingroom, kitchen, and bedroom (over 5 degrees!!).Glad I went with a well-known brand like Honeywell.

title: Simple but Good
author: TechNinja
info_3: Got this to replace an old mechanical Honeywell programmable one.  Installed in less than 10 minutes.  No installation instruction in the package.  Working fine so far.  No fancy features, but it's what I needed.  Great price and free shipping.

title: Very disappointed with product constantly have to fiddle with heat switch ...
author: Pay_itfwd
info_3: Very disappointed with product constantly have to fiddle with heat switch cuts on and off but found this out after i could return

title: meh, but works
author: Timbo
info_3: Screen is half broken and it is annoying to walk through the entire program each time you want to change a temperature or time. It does what it says it does though

title: Does the job. No bells or whistles
author: brutschman
info_3: Great replacement for our old fashioned thermostat. I needed something simple, no bells and whistles. Yet it is programmable. Was very easy and straightforward to install and has worked all winter without a problem. I'm very satisfied.

title: Easy Install and Operate
author: Joanna Chromik
info_3: Love this thermostat. I bought it in replacement to the "fancy" WiFi operated thermostat left by the previous owners in our new home which we could not get to function. This baby gets the job done and is very easy to install and operate. Perfect for changing settings in the morning/afternoon/evening and on the weekends.

title: Nice thermostat. Great price!
author: Hobgoblin
info_3: Works just fine and I installed it myself. I don't see any reason to pay a lot for a thermostat when this will do exactly what I need.

title: Works like it's supposed to
author: CaroleII
info_3: This thermostat does exactly what is says it will.  I have noticed a reduction in the electricity bill since programming it.  It is nice to come home to a warm house in the winter and cool house in the winter, and know that the A/C was not wasted all day. I love the ability to program different schedules for the weekend.  This Thermostat was very easy to install, the instructions made sense.

title: Great Product
author: David W. Anderson
info_3: This unit is exactly what I wanted. It is easy to install, good looking, performs perfectly, has all the features I need, and programming it is so intuitive there is no need to look at the manual. It even has a back-lighted screen.

title: Good value! It isn't the most feature packed thermostat ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Good value! It isn't the most feature packed thermostat out there but it's great for the $$$. Easy to install and set up. It does what it says it will.

title: Does exactly what I need for literally 1/10 the price ...
author: Agamemnon
info_3: Does exactly what I need for literally 1/10 the price of a Nest.But it's not "network enabled" you cry!Ummm... who cares?And this is from a guy who has 10-15 devices on his network almost all the time.

title: Works as intended. Haven't had any problems with it ...
author: Chase
info_3: Works as intended. Haven't had any problems with it in the few months I've had it. Definitely helps save money when you're upgrading from the old mercury dial style

title: No! Don't do it!
author: K. Colwell
info_3: I had to consult a YouTube video just to open this thing. Wow. Terrible design.

title: Great replacement for my old unit
author: Jon
info_3: I just installed this a few days ago and it seems to be working great.  It did not come with an owners manual, but I emailed honeywell and they promptly sent me one I could use.  Unit was easy to program, and - from what I can tell - works perfectly.

title: Works for me.
author: jengee2
info_3: This was to replace a really old thermostat. Think of late 80's type. Installed and works well.

title: So cheap, so simple.
author: Jacob
info_3: So cheap, so simple. In the age of technical gizmos, it is nice to find something that is simple as this. It doesn't take anytime at all to program, and even comes with recommended settings for minimizing power consumption. Installation is a breeze.

title: get this or a smart thermostat, there is no in between
author: Felix
info_3: Cheap, easy to install, easy to use, and has exactly the functions people really need and none of the fluffy stuff that is not worth paying for.

title: Four Stars
author: Ed Whatley
info_3: Worked o.k.

title: Works great with our Heater!
author: Calie
info_3: Works great for controlling my homes temperature in the winter when we are using the heater. Unfortunately, were not able to use it with a swamp cooler so we only use it to see what degrees it is in the house in the summer. The thermometer is very accurate though!

title: Great
author: Hannah H
info_3: Works great but the only thing I don't like is the screen turns black when the buttons are pressed.

title: Saves Money!
author: B-Rad
info_3: Works exactly as intended. They pay for themselves in no time and save big time on your heating and cooling bill (if you have a routine where you are gone most of the day). Installs in less than five minutes.

title: Great bargain. Replaced our old mercury thermostat with this ...
author: david stahl
info_3: Great bargain. Replaced our old mercury thermostat with this and it was a painless experience. Now everything is programmed and we are saving money on AC/Heating.

title: Four Stars
author: Kelsey
info_3: Works great! Arrived on time.

title: and these work great. They look sleek
author: A. Vanness
info_3: Swapped out some 10-year old thermostats, and these work great.  They look sleek, and the programming is awesome!  Saves money and time!

title: Five Stars
author: AmazonCustomer1
info_3: Easy installation. Works fine.

title: This product is a super cheap price super easy to operate which is what ...
author: RON
info_3: This product is a super cheap price super easy to operate which is what I love and it works great if I need 10 more I would buy 10 more

title: Easy to Use and Works Great!
author: Kim
info_3: I recommend that you have this installed by an HVAC guy or an electrician.  It is worth the money!  We blew a fuse on our A/C while we were hooking this up (we had a really old thermostat and the diagram did not account for all of the wires we had), and it cost us $60.00 (not the fault of the thermostat....it was user/installer error).  BUT, once it is hooked up, it works great!  Easy to program, easy to use!  Fantastic!

title: One Star
author: fred heldoorn
info_3: I order two of them and only one works. This isn't what I expected. 50% non working product !

title: Five Stars
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Easy install and worked like a charm.

title: Five Stars
author: Roy C Tobias
info_3: As advertised

title: This is an easy and inexpensive upgrade from an old, mechanical, mercury-containing thermostat
author: Reviewer
info_3: Installed this to replace a super-old, mercury-containing, mechanically-driven thermostat. The old thermostat had two wires, red and white. I plugged the red wire into the R-hole, and the white wire into the W-hole, put in some batteries and set the temperature. It's so easy to program too!

title: Honeywell RTH2300B1012/A 5-2 Day Programmable Thermostat / save money.
author: Todd
info_3: I live in a thatch hut of a house that is very leaky/drafty and in order to be comfortable with the old mercury Honeywell thermostat I had to air condition the house all day while I was gone to work because if I didn't it was 84 degrees until 2 AM. Well that's BS so I got this programmable unit that works great, is accurate, and has save me the price in one month of use. 28 bucks.

title: Product died within 2 months...
author: AZBruin
info_3: Bought two and one died within 2 months... not good to live in AZ and not have functioning AC unit...

title: the old one looked really bad. My husband had never installed a thermostat and ...
author: Kittysue
info_3: We needed a new thermostat, the old one looked really bad.  My husband had never installed a thermostat and was a little worried about doing it but it was a piece of cake.  It looks great and seems to work perfectly.  We tested it but really won't be using it much until this winter.  Will let you all know if we have any problems with it.

title: ... old mercury thermostat with this unit and couldn't be happier. Easy to install and operate
author: D.F.
info_3: I replaced a 40 yr old mercury thermostat with this unit and couldn't be happier.Easy to install and operate.  Great value!

title: Easy pizzy!
author: Donna Beasley
info_3: Easy to install, the Only thing that I would like is if it would be lit up all the time. Other than that easy to operate and set.

title: Very easy to install
author: Kathrine
info_3: Very easy to install,  my fiance is an iron worker and had no experience in electrical work, but he was easily able to install it without any hassle.  The programming is kind of dumb,  but i can live with it... lolGreat product for a great price

title: Less than a month and it has already paid for itself.
author: Dave Schneider
info_3: It's smaller than it looks in the pictures, but it works. Much, much better than our old-fashioned dial thermostat.You could buy a Nest for $250 and save enough money to pay for it in a couple years, but this thermostat is nearly as good once it's programmed correctly and will pay for itself in the first month.

title: Great All Around Thermostat
author: Sharbear
info_3: This is a very basic thermostat but it has everything you need, at a great price. Easy to install and program. Back lighting is a nice plus.

title: Simple to install, simple to use
author: Licher
info_3: This was simple to set up.  It came with stickers to label the wires from the previous thermostat which made transferring to the new one easy.  The interface is simple to use and programming it took all of 2 minutes.  The display lights up when buttons are pressed, but with the large temperature display, it's easy to view the temperature without having to turn the display light on.

title: Simple to install, program and use!
author: Ramesh Gopal
info_3: I replaced an old Honeywell mercury thermostat with this unit. There were only 2 wires (W and R) so installation was very easy. It works just fine. The only issue I have is that Honeywell does not make the consumer versions in a vertical format. The pro versions are vertical, seem much more complicated to install and are not supported by tech support for DIYselfers.

title: Work Great, easy to program
author: Mark, North Georgia USA
info_3: Sorry But I don't have it in me to review is thermostat. This has to be Honeywell number 5 over the last 25 + years. Work Great, easy to program, Purdy white color, Easy to wire and Never a problem. enough said...

title: Easy to install and setup
author: C Fritsche
info_3: As someone who is not trained in any skilled trade like ELEC or HVAC, this was extremely easy to install. Hint: read the instructions. The unit is difficult to separate from the wall plate, but that would be my only "complaint." It took slightly more than 5 minutes for me to install it, and maybe 5 more to get it programmed. I got it primarily because I would forget to turn my a/c up when I left the house about once every 1 to 2 weeks, and that really adds up during a TX summer. Now I don't have to worry about forgetting. As long as it keeps running my programmed settings, I'm happy.

title: The display is clear and easy to set up
author: Asaido
info_3: Bought this to replace a thermostat that had broken on me. It takes two AAA batteries which do last a long time. The display is clear and easy to set up. However, if you press on the screen a little too firmly, the ink bleeds a little. After a while, it turns back to normal.

title: But it works great and was a simple install
author: KC Realtor Jon
info_3: Not as programmable as I had with my last thermostat. You can only set a program for week days and weekends not each day of the week. But it works great and was a simple install. Great price.

title: Great for making you home more green
author: Jessica Alvarez
info_3: If you want to lower your electric bill and live more green this thermostat is the way to go! Love the weekday/weekend settings. Nice display as well. Fair price.

title: Easy install, great product
author: Kara
info_3: This thermostat came with clear directions and was easy to install in just a few minutes. Very happy with the user-friendly setup and flexible programming options. The backlighting is also really helpful.

title: Didn't need a bunch of bells and whistles. I ...
author: missinglink
info_3: Didn't need a bunch of bells and whistles. I was impressed at the variables this cost effective unit provided.Ample configurations allowed for adjusting to my schedule. Works as described.  Very simple set up.

title: Love and reasonable price easy to install
author: Sheryl L. Zenzen
info_3: Really easy to program which I love because I have a mon-fri and weekend schedule but I also go away frequently. I can easily reprogram whennoutnof town then reprogram when I get home! Great for conserving energy. Easy to install and fairly small so doesn't take away from home decor.

title: Somewhat technical to install but works great
author: rockinshoe
info_3: Somewhat technical to install but works great! Has weekday and weekend settings but easy to override at any point in time. Lights up when you press any button. Easy to read and extremely easy to program

title: Easy to Install and seems to be working!
author: Tasha
info_3: I had an older model Honeywell that was working fine, but I really wanted a programmable one. I'm in MN to anything to save on energy bills! I've never tried installing one before and I'm usually not very good with tools, but this one was easy to install and the directions were very clear. I'm really curious to see if it makes a difference on my energy bills.

title: Item works great but when the backlight is in you can see ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Item works great but when the backlight is in you can see where whoever assemble it left finger prints on the backside of the screen. Quite frustrating.

title: Best upgrade from the old mercury thermostats
author: Keith McLeod
info_3: Works as advertised. No bells or whistles It just turns the heat on or off when I tell it to. Out of the box it kicks on at 1Â° below set point and kicks off a 2Â° above. if you have an old mercury thermostat buy this.

title: Great affordable product by Honeywell
author: Krootie
info_3: Great product, easy to install even for a senior couple.  We were replacing a similar programable product which failed after about 10 years.  This Honeywell is smaller in size requiring some plaster and paint repair. But it used the same mounting holes as the previous thermostat.  It too requires programming skills - and as another reviewer suggested - get a youngster if you are a stranger to technology.

title: Great Programmable Thermostat
author: JoePope
info_3: Easy to install and setup.  I bought this for a condo that I rent out to replace and ancient thermostat.Looks great and pretty accurate.

title: As expected
author: Mr.Srt
info_3: Works as expected. Easy to use. No complaints.

title: super easy install with two wires
author: Brian
info_3: super easy install with two wires.  Replaced my old 70s thermostat with this one and took me less than 10 minutes.

title: A really decent thermostat. I subtracted 1 star because ...
author: John T.
info_3: A really decent thermostat. I subtracted 1 star because one button has to be pushed a bit harder than the other one's. This is the 3rd thermostat (same make & model) that I have had and the other previous 2 did not have this problem. But it's not enough to send it back.

title: Do not buy this!
author: Michael
info_3: Within a month after installation the display disappears for days, making it useless.  And only 30 days to return it?  Less than 4 months old and completely dead.

title: Wish I had bought a better model.
author: markstyles
info_3: The LCD screen detached from the board while opening before installation. Not sure if I simply got a dud or if all of them are this poorly made. Not worth my time to return it. Wish I had bought a better model.

title: Great!
author: craig andrus
info_3: So awesome! It has alot of preset options to change the temp on certain days and certain times and my husband got it all set up! Its always worked perfectly!

title: Excellent unit for the price
author: Daniel
info_3: Easy to install, even lined up with existing holes in the wall. Only disappointment is no illuminated display.

title: producd not as great as in store purchase
author: bobby
info_3: keeping product but dose the same thing as replacement that you sent not happy with new thermostat but need it display screen still has black in it but works as well as can be expected.

title: stat works
author: Aaron Bevan
info_3: Thought it would have more function.  Not great for heat pumps because there is only one heat terminal, but still works.

title: Otherwise it works just fine. Very simple to install
author: Adam
info_3: Does the trick. Wish there was a +/- set option though. Otherwise it works just fine. Very simple to install.

title: Best!
author: HMarie
info_3: I had gotten a different model at my old apartment that was difficult to set and always had error readings. This one was  super easy to install myself from a circular mercury oneReally really easy to set times and temp, change times and temps, or make it a little warmer without messing up the whole scheduleAnd great price

title: Perfect for gas fireplace
author: Gregory Wale
info_3: Great modern product with just the right amount of features for me. I use it on my gas fireplace in my man-cave because the remote was going out and this is way better. Cycles perfectly. And, I have it set to fallback to a low temperature late at night, which is a nice backup because I usually go to bed earlier and turn it down manually. So cheap and does what more expensive units do. The low cost secret is the features are behind menus instead of dedicated buttons but still it is easy to use.  Has a great feature that allows you to set the cycling property for high efficiency or low efficiency heat sources. For a gas fireplace only 10 feet away I set it to high efficiency and its perfect. You have to read instructions to learn how to use the buttons to set that up but its a one time thing. I like how the light comes on when I start using the buttons. Smart design.

title: works great, easy to use and program
author: Cole T
info_3: I bought this to replace a higher end one that had a touch screen that had a hard time with recognizing touches. It is a great thermostat and it is easy to program and use. I gave it four stars only because I miss features that my old one had

title: Has no swing setting pellet stove didn't even get a ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Has no swing setting pellet stove didn't even get a chance to turn off before it was calling for heat again...

title: Paid for itself in first month.
author: N. Santos
info_3: Basic Thermostat that does the job.  It is easy to program. It replaced a non-programmable and it paid for itself within the first month in energy savings.  This is a great investment for saving in heating energy costs. Wished it displayed the programmed temperature and the current temperature. Also that the display light could be allow to stay on.

title: I can add installing a thermostat to my personal resume
author: Jaided Dreamah
info_3: Real nice thermostat. Excellent price and easy to program. I am not a very handy person and this was pretty easy to install myself. The background light Is really good because of where I have it... I would buy this again but doubt I will have to. I think it's in for good!

title: Basic features, simple and reliable
author: Yakov Tokar
info_3: This is my second Honeywell RTH2300B1012/A. There is nothing fancy in this device, but the interface is easy to understand and use, and it has all the basic programming features. Forked fine all winter. For installation I'd recommend Honeywell 50002883-001 Cover plate which comes with a convenient wall bracket. Caveat: I am only using them for heating control as I have no central AC.

title: Nice way to automate your home air conditioning
author: Richard Z
info_3: Overall this is a nice product, with some cautions you might not be aware:1. compare the size of your old thermostat. if the wall under your old thermostat is unpainted, you might left with ugly "borders" around the new thermostat.2. this thermostat does not update itself on DST. so remember to adjust it.

title: Easy to install, easy to program
author: Amanda
info_3: I have no prior electrical experience and I was able to remove the old thermostat and install the new one without any problems. The thermostat was also easy to program and has already helped save us a ton of money by keeping the a/c off during the afternoon when our electric company charges us more for electricity.

title: had 1 unit already and was satisfied so ordered
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Have 2 one home.  had 1 unit already and was satisfied  so ordered another

title: Easy to install
author: Mike
info_3: Perfect i am really glad to find this cheap thermostat. Now my Ac working fine.

title: Easy to install and works exactly how you'd expect it
author: Meyer Denney
info_3: Easy to install and works exactly how you'd expect it. No need to buy some fancy $100+ thermostat. The amount of options in the programming on this thermostat fits my every need.

title: Exactly what I wanted
author: Joseph
info_3: Bought this to replace an old mercury thermostat. Installation was super easy and programming it was even easier. Didn't even need to use the manual. The time it took to remove my old one and install this was less than 15 minutes. Very happy with my purchase.

title: This thermostat is terrible. Setting it to 68 means it will run ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: This thermostat is terrible. Setting it to 68 means it will run until the house is 72 degrees. Junk.

title: Four Stars
author: DM
info_3: very good

title: Five Stars
author: Stoffer
info_3: Does the job right and won't break the bank!

title: Basic thermostat at a great price
author: MFA
info_3: This is a quality, good looking thermostat. It's a little smaller than the older styles, which makes mounting where an older thermostat was a little problematic - be ready to texturize and/or paint. Otherwise it's been great so far - easy to program, easy to hold a desired temperature in lieu of a program, easy fan on/off/auto switch.

title: It works.
author: Bill Welte
info_3: Basic thermostat. But it is very accurate in keeping the temperatures that are programmed into it.

title: Install was super easy. And has been very easy to program ...
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Install was super easy.  And has been very easy to program and adjust the programming when needed.

title: Not happy.
author: RIP
info_3: Didn't work with my heating system. By the time I had it looked at, I missed the return window and am stuck with it. Not happy.

title: Five Stars
author: Katie
info_3: Easy to install! Very nice!

title: Good product. I installed 2 of them without issue
author: Bill G
info_3: Good product. I installed 2 of them without issue. The thermostat operates as it should and the numbers and settings are illuminated for easy use.

title: Four Stars
author: Greg T.
info_3: Decent but doesn't work reliably with millivolt systems (even though the manual says it does).

title: Dead on Arrival
author: kenshell
info_3: DOA :(Did not work. I had to run out and buy something different at my local lowes

title: Five Stars
author: John Michalczyk
info_3: worked fine

title: Make Me Look Good!!
author: GG
info_3: I have next to no experience with home repairs, and even less with electrical wiring.  That being said, this thermostat was incredible easy to install (all by myself!) The instructions were very clear and easy to follow and I am one step closer to getting my energy consumption down to a more conscientious level.  Great product, so glad Honeywell is still around!

title: If you are first time call the number on back ...
author: Hilary C
info_3: If you are first time call the number on back not compatible with my style of heating pump ( electrical) . The product itself was okay - nothing to get excited about.

title: Difficult to Install
author: KBrooklyn
info_3: Very difficult to attach for the DIY without special small screw drivers.  Instructions for use are difficult to follow.  Pros installed the Pro model for me.

title: Thermostat
author: Lunytoon
info_3: Purchased October 2013 and it is already malfunctioning.  The display showed the low battery message and since I changed them, the thermostat has gotten a mind of it's own and won't program properly anymore.  Also when I tested the batteries they still showed they were good.  I don't think I'll be replacing my thermostat with another Honeywell.

title: Easy
author: John in Tennessee
info_3: Easy to hook-up and easy to program.  It comes with wire marker stickers to put on your wires for easy identification. Nice bright back light.  Super easy to program and use.  Using this is a lot better than having to turn our old one up and down every morning and night.

title: Exactly what I wanted.
author: Navarre89
info_3: Simple, straightforward, easy to install and use. No wi-fi, its a basic programmable upgrade for your thermostat.

title: Both work great allowing you to program both weekday and weekends
author: Ruth
info_3: Have two of these thermostats one to control a pellet stove and the other a gas cast iron stove, both milivolt setups. Both work great allowing you to program both weekday and weekends.

title: Not what I thought I was getting. The display ...
author: Gary A Patty
info_3: Not what I thought I was getting. The display only shows a temperature and I am never sure if that is the temperature I want or the current temperature.  I sure have bough a more expensive unit, but it has worked well.

title: Great thermostat! Easy to install and use. Very happy with this purchase!
author: John S Lorz
info_3: Easy to install. Lots of great features! I have a very old furnace that basically just has off/on wiring. I installed the thermostat in less than 5 minutes and it immediately worked. I like its programming features and the easy manual override.

title: poor quality control
author: Maryellen & Frank
info_3: Got it to work after straightening the pins inside that connect the two halves together. Wish I had spent a few extra dollars on something better made. My bad...

title: good thermostat. small print on controls
author: sjalexander
info_3: does the job. small print on the controls made it difficult for my mother-in-law to use it

title: Nice.
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Works well. Can be programed while not attached to wall.  Simple to plug into base attached to the wall after that.  Nice.

title: WORTH IT!
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Easy install. Took me about 10 minutes. Works much better than the old mercury one I had. Have already seen a noticeable savings in my energy bills.

title: Five Stars
author: R. moore
info_3: Works well, replaced a 16+ year thermostat. Will update review if there is any change.

title: Five Stars
author: Cody D
info_3: Nice basic digital thermostat! the schedule function is easy to setup and convenient!

title: Smudge smudge smudge
author: Hey Hey Trojan
info_3: Same problem as everyone else. Giant smudge in the lower right hand corner of the display. Sorry my picture isn't great, but trust me. That smudge is plain as day in person. Did it work? Yes. Was it easy to install and program? Yep. But that's why it's getting 3 stars instead of 1. Back to Amazon it goes. I'm not going to live with the huge spot on my display.

title: The unit works well and was easy to install
author: Greg E.
info_3: The unit works well and was easy to install.  I would go 5 stars if it showed both the setting temp and the actual temp at the same time.  My fault for not reading more thoroughly.

title: Easy to install and to program
author: Niles L. Perkins
info_3: This is a cat's meow. Easy to install and to program. Excellent buy for the money.

title: Great product. I only gave it 4 stars because ...
author: Ian W.
info_3: Great product. I only gave it 4 stars because the LCD can be hard to read sometimes, but it still functions flawlessly so I won't complain too much. One thing of note, the shopping package is a soft padded envelope and not a box, so check your mailbox if you feel it hasn't arrived.

title: easy install. Limited features
author: Tom
info_3: Easy to install and works well. Problem is it doesn't support aux/emergency heat.

title: Great lil' thermostat!
author: jpeg

title: Not too sure if it works with all millivolt systems
author: 38Packard
info_3: I purchased and installed three of these thermostats last Fall for our central oil-fired 24V heating system and they work like a charm.  I recently purchased one more for a "three season" room where we have a Hearthstone LP gas fire stove for heat which works off of a millivolt system.  The product literature states that this thermostat works with millivolt systems, but I cannot for the life of me get this to work reliably.  The thermostat is set to call of heat at 64 degrees but the room gets all the way down to 42 (this AM!) degrees and the stove is still not responding to the call for heat - even though the LCD reads "Heat On".  However, when I set the switch from Heat to Off, and then turn it back on to the Heat position, it sends the proper signal to the stove and it fires off.  This is a repeatable situation.  However, the thermostat does tell the stove when the nominal temperature has been reached as it always turns the stove off appropriately.  I've called Honeywell Customer Support (useless) and I Amazon has sent me a replacement thermostat to make sure that I did not have a defective one - but the replacement behaves in the exact same way.  Are there any heat professionals out there that might be able to tell me why this thermostat works "manually" but not automatically?  This is driving me crazy!!  Thank you!!

title: Oil prices keep going up!
author: culturejamming
info_3: I used this to upgrade an old Honeywell round style thermostat with a mercury tube inside.  There were three wires after removing the previous unit from the wall - red, white, and blue (like good ol' 'Merica!)  Installed these into the new unit without issue and my heat was working within 15 minutes.  Took a little extra time to mount to fragile plaster walls, as they like to crumble when drilled, requiring a very delicate touch.I love the programs!  There are four:  wake up, leave for work, get home, and go to sleep, and a separate set for the weekend.  You can change the times and temperatures for each.  We're poor young homeowners, so we can't afford to keep the house very warm.  Budgeting our will-call heating oil is crucial, since each delivery is about $850-900 and I try to stick with one a year.  Our current schedule with the programmable thermostat is 6:00 AM - 8:00 AM: 60F, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM: 54F, 5:00 PM - 12:00 AM: 60F, 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM: 54F.  We also have an electric fireplace television stand which keeps the living room (where the thermostat is located) about 2- 3F warmer when on.  Between these two measures, I expect to save on oil and will report back on my usage at the end of the season.Highly recommended if you want a basic, cheap, programmable thermostat to replace an aging unit.

title: Love this thermostat!
author: Rusty chambers
info_3: Best purchase I made all year and at a great price. My furnace had been acting up and the first thing my mechanically challenged wife said was "replace the thermostat".  I had the old round thermostat that came with the condo when it was built in 1991. If I set it for 68 degrees it would keep the furnace on till it hit 71degree and restart at 65. This kept our home either to hot or to cold. Drove me nuts with with such a large variable. The Honeywell comes on and off within 1 degree and we are much more comfortable winter and summer. By the way, the thermostat was not the problem with the furnace.I'm 67 and had no problems installing the unit. Reading the install and program instructions was another story. They just don't make instructions for the eye sight of seniors. My solution was to get the instructions on line and enlarge the print. After a little trial and error, I programmed it without any difficulties. I've changed the winter program a couple of times with no problems. For summer we just set what we want for temperature and press hold. Works great. I highly recommend it.You can pay more for extra "bells & whistles" but don't waste your money.

info_3: The thermostat functions as it's supposed to.  I love it.However I noticed that a lot of the reviews said there was a fingerprint behind the screen of this thermostat.  So I looked mine closely, and sure enough, I could see someone's fingerprint behind the screen.  I personally don't care too much.  But I can see how it could drive some people crazy.  Haha.  So if you're one of those people, maybe you should get something else.

title: Solid product.....Horrible foriegn tech support
author: 0711dog
info_3: Honeywell is a well established corporation.  The thermostat is a quality product and easy to program. Now the bad news: I have a non-standard color code on the wiring. So I called their customer service (1-800-468-1502) and was greeted by a man with an Indian (India) accent. When I told him that I needed to know what terminals to connect to a 2 wire 750 millivolt system he told me that it wouldn?™t work, even though the manual clearly states that it will work on a millivolt heater. After 15 minutes of arguing with him he put me on hold and finally came back with the proper information. Their extreme politeness does not substitute for knowledgeable  tech support.

title: 3 stars as the battery + signs are miss marked ...

Following the programming instructions is straight forward step by step, but I am certainly saving those instructions!

title: Raised my electric bill by $200!!
author: Robby
info_3: So I bought this thermostat to replace my old Mercury based thermostat with my Wesco Electric Furnace. I have to say, this works a lot worse than the old one. For instance, I programmed it to always stay at 63 degrees. My furnace is constantly running ever since i switched to this one. My electric bill went up 200 dollars. It will turn off for 5 minutes, then kick back on for another 10, all day every day. It will heat my house up up to 7 degrees more than what i programmed it to do! I have no idea why it does this, and I had a professional install it for me when he repaired my heater. I'm seriously considering returning this one, but I don't have the packaging anymore because I anticipated it to work like it was advertised..... Don't buy this thermostat, invest in one that will actually run your furnace correctly.

title: It works, that's all the positive I can give to it.
author: Mark Schneider
info_3: So far it FUNCTIONS OK. I bought this to replace the existing Honeywell programmable thermostat that was here when I bought the house, simply because that one didn't have a back-lit display, and I had to turn on the hall light to see what it was set to. That being said, I understand that this is the lowest price I could find to pay for a programmable thermostat with a backlit display on amazon, and I have to make certain concessions. But, there's two things that jump out and make me think "WTF?!?" in regards to this product. Number One is the huge, ugly splotch at the bottom left of the electro-luminescent back light in this unit.  I've been in electronics manufacture for over 30 years, and a defect like this would be a no-brainer -- it wouldn't get out of the QC floor, let alone out of the building onto a truck. And second, nowhere in the advertising, product packaging, or user manual does it say that the 2 AAA batteries it REQUIRES for operation aren't included. So, if you are ordering this and rightfully expecting  it to arrive complete and operational based on all advertising media on it, then you just might find yourself in a bind when it arrives and you install it, possibly disposing of your old thermostat, only to find that it's totally incapable of operating your heating system until you procure the 2 measly AAA batteries the multi-billion dollar Honeywell couldn't supply with the unit, even after saving countless millions by cutting back on its QC department.

title: Great Thermostat with Poor Customer Service.
author: glbegr
info_3: Don't think you can get a better programmable thermostat at this price.  A little difficulty getting it programed for what I wanted which is On fifteen minutes before I get out of bed then hold the set temperature until 30 minutes after bed time.  This is set to On then OFF for when you leave I assume for work then ON when you return home then then OFF for back to work then ON for return home for the evening then OFF for bedtime.  I contacted Honeywell via Email for instructions to program it if possible for just On and Off. ( We're retired and home all day.)  Will give Honeywell ONE star (would like to give them none) due to the TOTAL lack of response.  Always wonder why they include in the instructions if you need help contact us then usually don't.  Anyway got the results I wanted by programming it ON for an hour wake up time then OFF, leaving for work for only fifteen minutes, then ON for home for lunch, OFF after fifteen minutes for back to work, ON after fifteen minutes for home from work then Off thirty minutes after going to bed.  Sounds complicated but really isn't.  Works great and very happy with the thermostat.  Wish I could say the same for Honeywell customer service.

title: It was easy to install- and worked well through out the winter ...
author: Barth crater
info_3: If you order one of these- be sure to check that the Amazon site hasn't made your order for one- actually two.  This is one of the very first things I have ever ordered from Amazon and I ended up with and was charged for two-  lesson learned.It was easy to install- and worked well through out the winter months but when summer rolled around...  Well I apparently did not install it correctly and blew a transformer in the Air Unit.  So $250.00 later the AC guy replaced the transformer and reinstalled the old thermostat.  Best advice is to check with an AC tech to make sure your getting the right thing-  may save you some cash in the long run.  Another Lesson Learned.

title: Being replaced with a Lux
author: A. Wheeler
info_3: This worked for approximately one month.  It then started having problems not turning on when the temperature of the room dropped to where it should have.  I recycled the electronics system per the instructions, reset everything, checked all the connections and it still continued to not function correctly.  I sent email to Honeywell technical support and got no response for 10 days.  Their "customer support" is in India, so that should tell you everything you need to know about the rest of the experience in trying to get them to help.  Still unresolved, so I presume that I got a lemon and I'm stuck with having purchased one that is now past when I can get a refund.  Save your money and buy a Lux.  I've never had problems with one of their units.

title: Three Stars
author: Barbie
info_3: easy to use

title: Five Stars
author: Chai
info_3: Works

title: Does what it says
author: holmherzer
info_3: Works great

title: Great thermostat at a great price
author: Some consumer
info_3: Great thermostat at a great price.  Only knocking stars off because there is clear damage to the display.  Not bad enough for the hassle of returning.  Plus I was impatient to replace the antique I had in my house.  I think the previous owner bought it on Craigslist from Abraham Lincoln.

title: It might be a good thermostat - if you can get the wall plate off
author: J. M. Lane
info_3: Ugh. I wasted hours trying to get the wall plate off so that I could install the unit. Do your own research by Googling "Rth2300 removing wall plate".  There is a  good reason behind the claim of many returns. I sent mine back and bought another model.

title: Good Upgrade
author: Boyd
info_3: Upgrade, I thought this was supposed to have the ability to program 5/2 the model I got only allowed me to program one full week, there was no way to dset the day of the week and therefore I had to set the same program for every day without being able to use different settings on wheekends. I did order a used one so it may be possible that the seller mis-identified my thermostat making ti so I got the wrong one. Other thatn this problem I am very happy with the ease of installing it and how efficiently it appears to run so far compared to the one I had befor which could not be programmed at all.

title: Fonts too small
author: William H. Thoms Jr.
info_3: Price is right and programming the 5/2 day wake-leave-return-sleep data is not too hard. But, and this is a big but, the display fonts are way too small for easy reading. Unless you are eagle-eyed pass this model up and find one with a larger display.

title: useless
author: Aaron Campbell
info_3: DO NOT BUY. 2nd time I've tried this exact model, it turns the heater on in the middle of the night for NO reason. I bought a different brand and that one works perfect!

title: Cheap, Accurate, Precise
author: J. C.
info_3: Side by side they read the same temp.  Can't say the same for the competition.  "2 degrees is an allowable difference" the competition says.  That's not good enough for maintaining temp differences in a two story house.These are accurate, precise, and for the price can't be beat.  Not sure why you would want/need more programming options than 5-2.

title: VERY EASY THERMOSTAT CHANGE
author: Levron
info_3: This was an extremely easy thermostat change out. I had the same series heating and cooling thermostat that was non programmable, but used the same base plate.  I did not need to do any wiring change, just pulled the old thermostat off, plugged the new programmable version on the existing base plate and set up the new timing program. It is working perfectly.

title: Defective from the box
author: Ryan
info_3: Defective out of box. Wouldn't turn on the AC or fan. HVAC guy told me that Honeywell is falling behind. They put out mass amount of product for cheap but it is exactly that....cheap. You're better option is to bite the bullet and spend the $50 or so to get a good thermostat.

title: 3 units bought, minor issues with two of them, but they work okay
author: BeccaM
info_3: We purchased three identical Honewell 5-2 day programmable thermostats to replace some old mercury-balance switch thermostats which operate area under-floor radiant heating in our house. (Two of the five zones already had electronic thermostats.)One of the three, when I opened it up to begin installation, had a bent ground pin, which I was able to fix with some needle-nose pliers. And another unit has a minor display issue in the lower right corner such that if you press the down temperature button with much force, it shows compression blackness; obviously the plastic case is pressing on the LCD panel.Otherwise the units work well, and once programmed, we don't need to mess with the settings much. Plus the price wasn't bad. Still, from what other reviewers have been saying, it sounds like Honeywell has some manufacturing quality issues they need to address.

title: Buyer Beware - Mine was NOT new
author: zeke777
info_3: Buyer beware - I purchased this through "Best Faucet Deals" and it was not as advertised.  The item arrived in a white box - not the plastic blister packaging that's shown in the description.  Figured that it was just OEM packaging but upon further inspection the unit had scuff marks on the display, some discoloration and had clearly been used.  Sent it back for a refund.

title: Perfect!
author: J. M. Gray
info_3: This is just what I was looking for to replace my old thermostat!  Only needed it for our heating system, and there were only 2 wires to work with on my  wall...so was a bit worried, but it works perfectly!  Was able to program it easily, and I'm now a happy camper!  And it's easy to change the temp. if you need to, without affecting the programming. Great product!  Love it!

title: Good thermostat
author: nipdatip
info_3: Alright, what kind of thing can you expect from a thermostat review? Easy to install... Check. Works as advertised... check. One problem. Rather weird one. The screen displays ghost LCD errors. Not like numbers. Like circuitry running through the back. Makes me think it's on its last leg or something already. Maybe I'll try changing out the batteries. But upgrading from the old analog mercury thermostat, this thing might as well be made of gold.

title: Stupid programmable thermostat.
author: Charles C Pergiel
info_3: It's got 27 different time zones, and you have to set the temperature in each one individually until you get to page 27 of the instructions where they tell you about the hold button that let's you skip all the BS. And yes, you need a tiny screwdriver to connect the wires. Much prefer the old thermostat, except for the fact that it started flaking out and changing temperature settings whenever it feels like it.

title: Easy install.
author: Talktojerm
info_3: I was a little hesitant to pick this up at first for two reasons. First  I was worried that the install would be difficult and second because it seemed like "too good of a deal", compared to some of the others. Let me just say that install was a breeze and this really was a good deal. I liked it so much that I bought one for our cabin!

title: This is nice, however
author: Aundria L.
info_3: 1 degree flex temp means if you set it at 77F it won't come on until after it hits 79F (outside the 1 degree range), and won't stop until it's 76F.  This is nice, however, because it means the AC unit isn't constantly clicking on and off.  Has at home/leave/sleep time settings for both weekday and weekend, which is very nice, and the glow when it is on is nice and clear for use in the dark.

title: Installation guide was horrible. Setting the programmable portion was so tedious that ...
author: James
info_3: Installation guide was horrible. Setting the programmable portion was so tedious that I ended up wanting to use it without the programmable portion, which there were no directions for.

title: Caution - Know meaning of single stage versus multi stage - This is for SINGLE stage.
author: JP
info_3: My arbitrary star rating is more about the info on the site than this product that I had to return.  Who would know that your furnace, that just comes on and goes off, is multi stage like mine. I thought this term referred to some zoning like condition. It actually refers to the ability of the furnace to monitor how fast your house is heating up and adjust to a higher BTU setting temporarily if needed.

title: What good is it if you can't read the display
author: GSM
info_3: POS - the screen display went black. What good is it if you can't read the display. Of course this happens right after i'm unable to return it. I expected it to last longer then 3 months

title: Easy to install. Works great!
author: Cortney
info_3: This was super easy to install (and I have zero experience installing/replacing electrical items). I was replacing a digital thermostat that was not programmable, so I dont know how much harder this would be if you have a manual thermostat. I've been using it for 3 months now and it works great.

title: Waste of Money
author: Starbritefla
info_3: Hard to program. Once programed didn't work correctly.  Set on 78 degrees and it is always 71 in the house no matter what I do.  Will be replacing this one.

title: It follows a program, just not the one assigned....
author: Kara Marotta
info_3: I'm giving this 2 stars, because it is very easy to install and very easy to program. it does follow a program just not the one I assigned it. I programmed it to raise to 68 in the morning and it would be at 71, pretty much would overshoot every time. I am returning the item and trying a different brand and model.

title: excellent
author: EZ
info_3: have two of these at my house, and they work well and as expected, the programming is easy.  The only thing is it was trickly to figure out which wires to connect (I have only 2 thermostat wires, but the instructions were for 4)...

title: Good product, fairly easy to program.
author: Mike B.
info_3: I already have one of these that I use to run my Pellet stove. My first floor Programmable Thermostat stopped working so I got another one of these because I am familiar with the controls. All Programmable Thermostats can be challenging to set up  initially but I find this model to be less so.

title: It doesn't even work!!!
author: Sarah L.
info_3: I chose a one star, which means "I hate it"!  What should have been a simple installation turned into a nightmare and ended up costing us a lot of money!  My husband, who is a licensed contractor, installed this thermostat the other night.  All appeared well until we woke up to a 50 degree house the next morning.  We thought something might be wrong with the furnace so he looked it over and found a fuse that was blown.  He went to the store and got a new one.  It blew again.  We had to call a licensed HVAC technician and have him come out only to discover that the thermostat doesn't work properly, therefore blowing the fuse.  That cost us almost $100 for him to diagnose and install a thermostat that actually works (because it is winter in Michigan and we need heat right now)!  Buying this thermostat ended up costing us $125 and we don't even have it anymore!  I sent it back for a refund!!!

title: It is okay
author: Judith756
info_3: I don't understand why they can't write directions to program these things step by step and in simple language.  I am not stupid, but still can't program the thing.

title: easy and simple
author: B. Das
info_3: very simple to install my house had an old analog thermostat with weird colors it is just common sense ...if you have just heating system with 2 wires connected to old analog thermostat connect them to white and blue it will work.

title: Will not recommend to anyone
author: xyz
info_3: it not very friendly. does not show the temperature you have set. Only shows the actual temp. Makes it hard to know set temp. You have to go through all setup to see set temp. Very inconvenient. Will not recommend to anyone.

title: nice
author: Z
info_3: Very easy to install and use. My old one was the dial mercury thermostat which was trickey at times now no more tricks.

title: Works great, doesnt cost a lot.
author: Kyle
info_3: Why buy a hundred dollar thermostat? This one is easy to install, easy to program, and does everything you'd expect. I like that you can program a weekday schedule and a separate weekend schedule.

title: Only for central systems
author: april donnelly
info_3: Read the fine print this is only for central systems and if u try to return it after u buy it they want u to pay the shipping back. Which to me wasn't worth it bc the shipping costs more then the actual product.

title: I'm sure the thermostat is fine, but I wish they would have included a ...
author: A. Fritz
info_3: I'm sure the thermostat is fine, but I wish they would have included a cheap little screwdriver to secure the wires. I don't have an eyeglass kit, and that's the size that's needed on these tiny flathead screws.

title: Great price and product.
author: J. Sanchez
info_3: This was my first time replacing a thermostat and it was much easier than I anticipated. I was quickly able to install and program the product. I am very happy with the price of the product and ease of use.

title: Great Thermostat
author: Concerned Consumer
info_3: This thermostat arrived on time and it was very easy to install. It works fine and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a a replacement.

title: The product works as advertized.
author: Lancelot
info_3: I am not very motivated to write the review for this thermostat, because there is nothing, which fascinates or excites me about it.I purchased this thermostat to replace our over 10 year old one with partly missing digits because I have had good experiences with Honeywell products.The installation was very easy, explained in the supplied installation guide and operating manual.  The thermostat works as advertized with the highlight of the 24 hour clock function.I have deducted two stars for the in my opinion too small, even flimsy ?œFan Auto - On and System Heat - Off - Cool??selector switches.I am convinced that these weak points will be the first parts to fail.  Well, time will tell but so far so good.

title: Five Stars
author: terry hollingsworth
info_3: great buy

title: The good will sticker where it was bought was still on ...
author: Randy whitley
info_3: product arrived as noted. The good will sticker where it was bought was still on th package. The package had been open and taped shut. yet to try product to see if it works

title: Does exactly what it says it does. Does it ...
author: Knuckles
info_3: Does exactly what it says it does. Does it simply and does it well. Once its programmed it is done. Leave it alone and go on with life.

title: Really disappointed. Decent customer service so far
author: britt
info_3: About a size too small for me. Really disappointed. Decent customer service so far. Will change stars when the process is complete

title: One Star
author: JB
info_3: Does not do aux heat

title: It's a Honeywell, what do you expect???
author: M. Napolitano III
info_3: Super easy to install.  Very easy to program. Does what I want it to do.  NOTE: need tiny screw driver to secure wires.

title: One Star
author: JLIJ
info_3: After 1 month, sent short to furnace and blew fuses.

title: Two Stars
author: A. F.
info_3: This does not work with a heat pump.

title: Easy to read
author: Anthony Montemarano
info_3: We replace an older Honeywell that came with the house.  This Honeywell, with the built in light is easy to read.

title: This is the biggest piece of crap i have ever used
author: Ronald Africk
info_3: This is the biggest piece of crap i have ever used. You need a PhD to program this stupid thing.

title: works better than a different more expensive model I purchased at ...
author: Doris C.
info_3: works better than a  different more expensive model I purchased at home depot

title: Easy to use
author: bulbasaur
info_3: Wake, Leave, Return, Sleep. M-F, Sa-Su.  Simple.  I only used the red and black wire for my old gas furnace.

title: One Star
author: Josh
info_3: Stopped working within 2 months of installing and after 1 month of use.

title: ... day one with this one deem to work okay easy to
author: RONALD T MCQUEEN
info_3: replece my old 5 day one  with this one deem to work okay easy to program

title: One Star
author: Preston M Steele
info_3: Unit stopped working after having it far a few months.

title: Should have bought one sooner.
author: stephanie
info_3: Easy to program, works perfectly.  Way to go for the price.

title: Five Stars
author: Bruce M Johnson
info_3: It does what you said it would do.

title: good buy
author: sonkey
info_3: works exactly as advertised

title: Quality
author: Amazon Customer
info_3: Quality product.

title: Four Stars
author: RJ
info_3: do what they R meant to do

title: Five Stars
author: Anonymous
info_3: Works as expected.

title: Five Stars
author: Brian Berry
info_3: Excellent value
